word: We need to weed out from our conversation everything that is harsh and condemnatory. When we have put on Christ in meekness and lowliness of heart we shall represent Christ in all our dealings with our children. To all who labor in Christ's lines for the salvation of souls, the Saviour says, "We are laborers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building."-- Ms 143, 1899, pp. 9, 11, 12. ("Co-Workers With Christ," October 4, 1899.)
